title: Update PT 2: Should He Propose Again After She Already Shot Him Down The First Time
description:
He proposed once and got the big no. Should he propose again or just bail?
They’ve been together for 7 years and after 3 of those years, with no doubts in his mind, he proposed.
Usually, when someone proposes, they’re expecting, and, for the most part, certain that the person they’re proposing to will say yes.
